name: Defeat The Nian（击败年兽）
description:
大家好，我们是来自中国的一支业余游戏制作团队，

Hello, we are an amateur game production team from China,

该作品是参加Ludum Dare 52届Game Jam的参赛作品，

This work is the entry work of Ludum Dare's 52nd Game Jam,

本次大赛的主题是丰收，

The theme of this competition is harvest,

我们第一时间就想到了中国的新年，这在中国是庆祝丰收的时间，

We immediately thought of the Chinese New Year, which is a time to celebrate the harvest in China,

接着就联想到了一个古老的中国神话——年兽，

Then it was associated with an ancient Chinese myth - Nian Beast,

你可以在维基百科里查到这个神话故事，

You can find this myth on Wikipedia,

因此我们以此为主题，制作了这个游戏，

So we made this game with this theme,

借此表达对2023年的展望，

To express the outlook for 2023,

希望您玩得愉快，并在参赛界面给我们反馈！

I hope you have a good time and give us feedback on the competition interface!
